top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "data.dat" has stored data under the field heading item name, quantity and rate. Write a program to display all the records with total.
What is Primary Key? f) Write any two types of operators used in C language.

What is cloud computing? What are the services provided by cloud computing. f) Define Data and Information. g) What is MS-Access? Write the features of MS-Access. h) Define action query. i) What is table? Write the basic components of table.
Which query is used to make change the data present in the database.

Write down the output of the given program. Show with dry run in table. DECLARE SUB TEST(A$) CLS A$="PABSON" CALL TEST(A$) END SUB TEST(A$) FOR I=1 TO LEN(A$) B$ = MID$(A$, I, 1) C$=C$+B$ NEXT I PRINT C$ END SUB
